alert.note: Alert for Gallatin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 10 at 6:24PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Montana, including the following county, Gallatin. * WHEN...Until 600 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 617 PM MDT, Montana Department of Transportation reports snowmelt flooding that has led to water over roadways. Minor flooding is already occurring. - Obey law enforcement requests in the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northeastern Gallatin County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
